description: Solvent Sector Plan for ODS Phaseout in China

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
1. Build up the national training center to provide technical support for enterprises on ODS phase out. 
2. Coordinate with ODS end users, the small-medium enterprises, and encourage them to join the project and phase-out ODS. 
3. Establish the mechanism of ODS phase-out including big contracts implementation, voucher system, reimbursement contracts etc. 
4. Enhance cooperation with related stake holders such as China Custom etc. 
5. Improve the public awareness on ODS phase-out. 
6. Strengthen the capacity of central and local government on their compliance with the Montreal Protocol. 
7. Monitor the illegal ODS import/export. 
8. Promote the local production of alternatives and alternative technology for ODS used in Solvent Sector.
subproject.title: Solvent Sector Plan
